item.description:
Local Natives are at House of Blues touring their new album Hummingbird: http://www.youtube.com/localnativesband with the Superhumanoids: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=aV_GKbaiSHk. Gotta get tickets on Stub Hub pretty soon cuz their sold out from HOB.

I'm in the Mezzenine General Admission. If anyone wants to go we can meet at The Landsdowne right next door for a tasty beverage before the show @ around 6p. (Doors at 6p).

Local Natives at House of Blues Boston, Boston, MA
Sat, 03/30/2013, 6:00 p.m. EST
(Event time subject to change - Check local listings)
Mezzanine GA | 1 ticket
Row GA9. | Seat 166
item.name: Local Natives, Superhumanoids @ HOB - Saturday, March 30th
